Title: Bureau
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), David Phillips, Alison Agosti, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: While Amy continues to work on Figgis' sister Maura on the inside, Jake, Rosa and Holt team up with Bob Annderson to track down the FBI mole. Meanwhile, Gina helps Terry work out the culprit behind a press leak.
